page.title: 12EATING IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: BREAKFAST-Cereals,Fruit juice PACKED LUNCH-Crisps,sandwiches(meat or cheese),Wrapped chocolate biscuit,apple ,squash.SCHOOL LUNCH-Roast meat,carrots ,potatoes,cabbage.Treacle sponge or apple crumble. SUNDAY LUNCH-Soup,roast beef,lamb,pork or chicken,vegetables.Ice cream. BEVERAGES-Tea,coffee,soft drink. Other favourite meals include Spaghetti Bolognaise,Pasta with sauce,Hamburgers, chips.CHILDRENS FAVOURITE RESTAURANT- MacDonalds.A few people cook with micro -wave ovens.Many families grow or pick their own fruit and vegetables for the freezer.More and more people bulk buy.
